import axios from"axios";const API=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"https://twiller-complete-project.onrender.com/api"});// Attach JWT token to every request if available
API.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(token){config.headers["Authorization"]="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});export default API;
